sentences.sContent: Emigration has notably increased over the past five years.
sentences.sCn: 在过去五年中，移居国外的人明显增加。

sentences.sContent: Notably absent from his statement was any hint of an apology.
sentences.sCn: 他的话里显然没有丝毫道歉的意思。

words.tran: 值得注意的，显著的；著名的
著名的；显著的；附有乐谱的
注意；记下（note的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: in a way that is clearly different, important, or unusual
